'''Tea Fragrance in the Tranquil Court''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Tea Fragrance in the Tranquil Court is obtainable from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=240}}.
